page.title: 04ATTITUDES-LIKES AND DISLIKES
page.content: My hobbies are judo,swimming,football & cubs.I play a lot on my bike with my friends. When I grow up I want to work for British Telecom.I would like to have a Ferrari Boxer & I would like to have a motorbike Suzuki 500 RD.I have never been in an aeroplane.I would like to own a big house with big gardens front & back.The programmes I like on television are STREET HAWK, THE PRICE IS RIGHT & KNIGHT RIDER.I don't like FAMILY FORTUNES, PLAY YOUR CARDS RIGHT & DALLAS.My ambition is to play football for Everton.I think the number of unemployed is terrible.When I grow up I hope to have a job.The films that I like to watch at the cinema are STAR WARS,the EMPIRE STRIKES BACK & RETURN OF THE JEDI. My favourite group is BREAK DANCE.My favourite subjects at school are Maths,English,swimming & games.
